title: DATS data repository schema
description: A repository or catalog of datasets. It could be a primary repository or a repository that aggregates data existing in other repositories.

identifier.description: The identifier of the data repository.

alternateIdentifiers.description: Alternate identifiers for the data repository.

relatedIdentifiers.description: Related identifiers for the data repository.

name.description: The name of the data repository.

description.description: A textual narrative comprised of one or more statements describing the data repository.

dates.description: Relevant dates for the data repository.

scopes.description: Information about the nature of the datasets in the repository, ideally from a controlled vocabulary or ontology (e.g. transcription profile, sequence reads, molecular structure, image, DNA sequence, NMR spectra).

types.description: A descriptor (ideally from a controlled vocabulary) providing information about the type of repository, such as primary resource or aggregator.

licenses.description: The terms of use of the data repository.

version.description: A release point for the repository, when applicable.

publishers.description: The person(s) or organization(s) responsible for the repository and its availability.

aggregatorOf.description: The DataRepositories aggregated by this repository. This property will be empty for primary repositories.

access.description: The information about access modality for the data repository.

extraProperties.description: Extra properties that do not fit in the previous specified attributes.
